pkgmetadata.longdescription: Topology-based pathway analysis of RNA-seq data // Implementation of methods for topology-based pathway analysis of RNA-seq data. This includes Topological Analysis of Pathway Phenotype Association (TAPPA; Gao and Wang, 2007), PathWay Enrichment Analysis (PWEA; Hung et al., 2010), and the Pathway Regulation Score (PRS; Ibrahim et al., 2012).
